channel.title: Any one have ::checkkills or ::kills command?
channel.description: hey i need a ::checkkills commands so ppl know much kills they got so they can see what they can buy with their points any got please?

item.title: Any one have ::checkkills or ::kills command?
item.dc:creator: @JohnnyWorldz517 JohnnyWorldz517
item.description:
@JohnnyWorldz517 wrote:

} if (cmd[0].equals("checkkills")) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You currently have "+(p.kills > 0 ? p.kills : "no")+" spendable kills."); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You currently have "+(p.totalKills > 0 ? p.totalKills : "no")+" kills.");
